oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aperture coupled microstrip antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KUMAR, G
KOTAPATI, RK
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Experimental results on broadband aperture coupled dual and triple stacked aperture coupled microstrip antennas have been presented. An hour glass shaped aperture has been used which yields maximum coupling. Both rectangular and circular patches have been used. The measured bandwidth of 25% to 30% has been obtained for dual and triple stacked configurations respectively.
